about_the_game:
Welcome to a collection of fantastical and imaginative worlds, packed to the brim with memorable characters, rich stories, and unforgettable encounters. Be prepared to venture through more adventures than you could shake a sword at - and this is just the beginning.

Handcrafted Fantasy

From a cosy frog mystery to an epic fantasy filled with knights and magic, there is a story for everyone in Vesper. Explore vibrant 3D worlds jam-packed with hidden secrets, charming creatures, and… is that a talking sword?! Crafted from the ground up by a diverse range of creators and storytellers, each story will feature so many mysteries to uncover.

Worlds Built by Creators

Experience exclusive stories brought to life in Vesper. Each adventure has been tailor-made by comedians, Dungeon Masters, authors and all-round creative masters you might know from Dungeons & Dragons, Dropout, Comedy Central and beyond. They include creators like Amy Vorpahl, Ross Bryant, Ify Nwadiwe, Aliza Pearl, Johnny Stanton IV and more...

Choices and Challenges

Interact with characters and make dialogue choices that could lead to strong friendships, and even stronger rivalries. You’ll find yourself drawn into strategic dice & deck-based challenges, which will test your heart, energy, authority and dexterity. Who knows? You might just have what it takes to survive if you play your cards right. You’re at the heart of your own unique experience.

A Growing Collection

Imagine that you had a key to a secret library, which holds new magical stories in it every time you look. Vesper is this key. With regular updates bringing fresh features, new tales and more ways to support your favorite creators, there’s something for everyone.

Jump into our Discord and let’s discover our next adventure together, shall we?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.9 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M290 or equivalent

name: Vesper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz (Intel i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400, GT 710 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad Core ~2.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 - GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Enter Vesper, a growing library of unique narrative games made by your favorite creators — inspired by classic TTRPGs. Come explore wonderful new worlds with us. Who knows what you’ll find?
